Dear Shamil,
With reference to the previous booking, we usually record it under the designated structure. However, we received instructions not to use it, so we proceeded to book it under 10A01 instead.
Please note that these invoices relate to Workmen’s Compensation. As such, they do not include an Excel breakdown linked to individual employees.
Regarding the insurance period, I’ve looped in @Margot <mailto:Margot.Diab@chalhoub.com>  for further clarification and guidance.
Best regards,
Ahmad

AHMAD ALNAJDAWI
